original_text: Jerusalem is now like a hut in a vineyard or in a field of crops. It stands there alone, with its enemies all round it.
korean_text: 딸 시온은 포도원의 망대 같이, 참외밭의 원두막 같이, 에워 싸인 성읍 같이 겨우 남았도다

sentences.original_text: Jerusalem is now like a hut in a vineyard
or in a field of crops
with its enemies all round it
